title: Demi Lovato channels Marie Antoinette with incredible Halloween costume
text:
Demi Lovato pulled off an incredible transformation for Halloween this year.

The "Sorry, Not Sorry" singer unveiled her costume, channeling Marie Antoinette, in a series of Instagram snaps on Thursday.

She created the look with the help of celebrity makeup artist Etienne Ortega and celebrity hairstylist Paul Norton.

"Halloween round 1... I told y’all I don’t play on Halloween!! It’s my time to shine 😝✨ glam team killed it" she captioned her selfie featuring the costume.

She also included a shot of the entire look, although her blonde wig was arguably the best part of the costume.

Her post, which has already received 1.5 million likes, received adoring comments from fans who were amazed by the look.

Many stars have been getting festive early this season. Reese Witherspoon recently shared some Halloween costume inspiration from some of her past roles for fans still searching for ideas.

We can't wait to see the most amazing costumes this year!
description: Demi Lovato pulled off an incredible transformation for Halloween this year.
